entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12 with temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 70 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 12 with temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023
